6d8c85c13bf2ad0b.ContentText: How did it go? Did you manage to locate Dan Shu?

2532283f0b33fd40.ContentText: So you weren't able to apprehend her... I see. These people have been in hiding for so long — they must have a more nefarious plan. I've got to apprehend them quickly.

7e4402358f467141.ContentText: Once again, thank you for all your help. With your intel, we will put a stop to Dan Shu.

205a3655bbc4a0c7.ContentText: Take this as a token of my appreciation. You deserve it.

caaf145f3a968e3e.ContentText: These people have been in hiding for so long — they must have a more nefarious plan. I've got to apprehend them quickly.

d70065fef47de4c8.ContentText: Time to come out, little Diting. I need you to help me find Dan Shu.
d70065fef47de4c8.Speaker: playerboy

24ea22676929c7e1.ContentText: Jing Yuan tells me you'll be joining the forces led by the Alchemy Commission and master diviner — I won't take up any more of your time. Please take good care of yourself.

771ac86e7117fe60.ContentText: If you run into Dan Shu again — contact the nearest Cloud Knights.

ContentText: She really caught up with us...
Even had time to set up an ambush...
I have one thing to say:
Sampo never lets friends who've helped him come to harm.
I say what I mean... and I mean what I say.
Let me go — I gotta... I have to get to her!
Long time no see, Astral Express crew.
I came at a good time. You're all here...
No need for the mysterious introduction...
Apologies for interrupting your little get-together.
But I'm sure once you've heard my request...
I'd like you to make a...

1a4faf026afab42a.ContentText: I mean c'mon, {NICKNAME}, you've got a Stellaron in your body, I have my special {RUBY_B#Mysterious Ice Crystal}Six-Phased Ice{RUBY_E#} powers, and Dan Heng... Uhh, he's got that mysterious past thing going for him...
1a4faf026afab42a.Speaker: March 7th

668c9c3d1df472c5.ContentText: Ah! {NICKNAME}, you're a genius! Great idea!
668c9c3d1df472c5.Speaker: March 7th

7710bf0975fe3333.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, March, be ready to make an escape.
7710bf0975fe3333.Speaker: Dan Heng

68dcb973eab458ba.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you tried your best to persuade him. It's my fault for not preparing better for such a situation in advance.
68dcb973eab458ba.Speaker: Dan Heng

1ea5d89ac80ebc00.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, did you have a dream again last night?
1ea5d89ac80ebc00.Speaker: Dan Heng

cf1ae44d0bc5db11.ContentText: It's the bane of Svarog! The big hero of the Underworld — {NICKNAME}!
cf1ae44d0bc5db11.Speaker: Sampo

64f01d9d90c088a5.ContentText: (I should go meet up with March and Dan Heng.)
64f01d9d90c088a5.Speaker: playergirl

271fc8308cb6afcd.ContentText: Ah, young {F#lady}{M#lad}. I wanted to see you off, but you know how things are around here in the underground. Solve one problem and three more take its place.

7f5344feacabc674.ContentText: {NICKNAME}? Nice to meet you. My name's Dan Heng, and this is March 7th.
7f5344feacabc674.Speaker: Dan Heng

b79a4ed68d85b54e.ContentText: Agreed. {NICKNAME} and I made it here safely, and now we've also got Dan Heng. We're more than enough to protect you~
b79a4ed68d85b54e.Speaker: March 7th

9c392cfc29347a7b.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, think carefully about how you wanna reply to that.
9c392cfc29347a7b.Speaker: March 7th

438f7a0708a8110d.ContentText: Well, that's the joy of youth! We should take every step forward full of energy! {M#He's}{F#She's} a discerning one, isn't {M#he}{F#she}, Dan Heng?
438f7a0708a8110d.Speaker: March 7th

670297e7ee97765b.ContentText: Hello, you must be... {NICKNAME}, right? How can I help you?
670297e7ee97765b.Speaker: Asta

396cebb9c829ca4d.ContentText: What's the matter, {NICKNAME}? You seem to have something on your mind.
396cebb9c829ca4d.Speaker: Himeko

accc561e65280139.ContentText: Looks like that's all the researchers who need help. Let's go check in with Asta.
accc561e65280139.Speaker: playergirl

73567e422321b096.ContentText: Would {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} {NICKNAME}, Ms. March 7th, and Mr. Dan Heng please proceed immediately to the master control station. Lead Researcher Asta is waiting for you.

d5a0bb52e4ae9950.ContentText: That's why we have to leave and take {NICKNAME} with us.
d5a0bb52e4ae9950.Speaker: Himeko

85bea14e71ee6bff.ContentText: {M#He's}{F#She's} the one who can help us turn the tides... Of course, I may be wrong.
85bea14e71ee6bff.Speaker: Himeko

f58e6333b534ae6f.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, use the control device to switch the repulsion bridge.
f58e6333b534ae6f.Speaker: Dan Heng

e982cfd2916f3350.ContentText: Moreover, the Stellaron is still very stable in {NICKNAME}'s body.
e982cfd2916f3350.Speaker: Himeko

cbf240f1c9bd62e3.ContentText: Don't judge a book by its cover, Herta. Case in point, that puppet body of yours is actually much smaller than {NICKNAME}.
cbf240f1c9bd62e3.Speaker: Himeko

b07a544b09fc4cb8.ContentText: Alright, {NICKNAME}. I got it. But I'm still gonna call you little twerp. The space in my brain is too valuable to store peoples' names.
b07a544b09fc4cb8.Speaker: Herta

adc79ebf8f3e3fb3.ContentText: Can I bring {M#him}{F#her} in for some research?
adc79ebf8f3e3fb3.Speaker: Herta

312bfcb850e6d16d.ContentText: That's not up to me to decide. You can ask {NICKNAME} yourself...
312bfcb850e6d16d.Speaker: Himeko

3894b0a27933ef3a.ContentText: You understand now, {NICKNAME}? Herta wants you to stay in her space station.
3894b0a27933ef3a.Speaker: Himeko

583b7dc7dcd66ca8.ContentText: {NICKNAME}... You also have another option — the Astral Express. If you want, you can leave with us.
583b7dc7dcd66ca8.Speaker: Himeko

598f1097dabbac97.ContentText: There's no need to rush into this, Herta. Asta's in the master control zone. Let's let {NICKNAME} have a talk with Asta first and decide for {M#himself}{F#herself}.
598f1097dabbac97.Speaker: Himeko

4c14f9b5d2cda744.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I'll be waiting for you on the platform. It's no hurry if you still have things to do or someone to see.
4c14f9b5d2cda744.Speaker: Himeko

5eb8aa05e1481e16.ContentText: And I think you're pretty good at "meddling" too, {NICKNAME}.
5eb8aa05e1481e16.Speaker: Asta

b8256b26815ef93e.ContentText: Hey, {NICKNAME}! I heard the news. You're coming with us on the Express, right?
b8256b26815ef93e.Speaker: March 7th

2a54854b4be64ff3.ContentText: Join us, {NICKNAME}. Then it wouldn't be a problem anymore.
2a54854b4be64ff3.Speaker: March 7th

db280b95643b2e20.ContentText: Oh, it's you, {NICKNAME}... Do you have something on your mind?
db280b95643b2e20.Speaker: Dan Heng

3661e786690734bc.ContentText: I think you're not bad yourself, {NICKNAME}.
3661e786690734bc.Speaker: Dan Heng

fbb17b328b2084dd.ContentText: Uh, then why hasn't {F#she}{M#he} woken up yet?
fbb17b328b2084dd.Speaker: Sampo

6056450e58264114.ContentText: Because {F#she's}{M#he's} sound asleep — didn't you hear {F#her}{M#him} sleep talking? ...Poor child, sounded like a bad nightmare.
6056450e58264114.Speaker: Natasha

07d4571baacce092.ContentText: (I gotta find March 7th and Dan Heng... but where should I start?)
07d4571baacce092.Speaker: playergirl

00d10af4bcfa3af2.ContentText: Oh-ho? Brothers and sisters, an unexpected turn of events... Two members of the audience have charged into the octagon! It looks like they want to team up with Cold Dragon Young!

41729957c5864ecf.ContentText: Yeah! The first thing {NICKNAME} and I did was go look for you! And now that we've found you, we're trying to make sure you don't get your butt kicked! You're welcome~
41729957c5864ecf.Speaker: March 7th

1069512a5b329978.ContentText: Huh. {NICKNAME}, when did you start being so nice?
1069512a5b329978.Speaker: March 7th

f0c28404f7901bca.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you just got here and now you're gonna leave? Play hide-and-seek with me!
f0c28404f7901bca.Speaker: March 7th

5d05138dc42714d4.ContentText: ...Ugh, so what if I am! {NICKNAME}, why don't you help me, huh!?
5d05138dc42714d4.Speaker: March 7th

992b33d6354dfc06.ContentText: Okay, okay, we're done. Pitch-Dark Hook the Great, this is my friend, {NICKNAME}. {F#She}{M#He} also wants to join The Moles. Can {F#she}{M#he} play too?
992b33d6354dfc06.Speaker: March 7th

01593ccd532ae012.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, it's simple. When you see one of them, you just have to catch them!
01593ccd532ae012.Speaker: March 7th

547aa86893cce3af.ContentText: Oh, hi {NICKNAME}, wanna listen to my thoughts on the underground?
547aa86893cce3af.Speaker: March 7th

18521ead13e75686.ContentText: Ah, young {F#lady}{M#man}. This isn't the best place for a chat. Let's keep things brief.

4acbe6d91fa6fa45.ContentText: What do you think, {NICKNAME}? Should we go ahead and call it a day, or walk around a bit more first?
4acbe6d91fa6fa45.Speaker: March 7th

8395c563d92a76bf.ContentText: *sigh* Happy now? {NICKNAME} is even starting to sound like you.
8395c563d92a76bf.Speaker: March 7th

49f136dabe716cf5.ContentText: Would you look at {NICKNAME}, blurting out something so irresponsible.
49f136dabe716cf5.Speaker: March 7th

02058e6cfec00da7.ContentText: (That voice again... such a strange dream.)
02058e6cfec00da7.Speaker: playergirl

5c11ed10d43dbb06.ContentText: (May as well go for a walk if I can't sleep.)
5c11ed10d43dbb06.Speaker: playergirl

b1ff1f70a8fe6c4b.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}. If we hadn't run into you two, Seele would've had to venture into the Fragmentum on her own.
b1ff1f70a8fe6c4b.Speaker: Natasha

d3500a64fa225878.ContentText: (This is a little far, I should follow Bronya.)
d3500a64fa225878.Speaker: playergirl

dd888a4ea01512ab.ContentText: (I should let those two be alone for a bit...)
dd888a4ea01512ab.Speaker: playergirl

b3a93d3f967fdaca.ContentText: (The only thing left to find is painkillers. I'll see if there's any nearby.)
b3a93d3f967fdaca.Speaker: playergirl

a837cdf576396f61.ContentText: I've seen this person before. {F#Sh—She's}{M#H—He's} not bad, right?
a837cdf576396f61.Speaker: Clara

f5d4ce0f57d615bb.ContentText: This place is dangerous. You should leave.
f5d4ce0f57d615bb.Speaker: Clara

90ddd7ba9b742c33.ContentText: ...Uh, is that what you're here for too?
90ddd7ba9b742c33.Speaker: Clara

d141ad2cd5faa819.ContentText: Haha, you're adorable, Bronya. {NICKNAME} was obviously joking~
d141ad2cd5faa819.Speaker: Natasha

093579f7c73ff3b3.ContentText: ...{NICKNAME}, can I smash this can opener already!?
093579f7c73ff3b3.Speaker: March 7th

a22c289d73315eb2.ContentText: ...{NICKNAME}, can I smash this can opener already!?
a22c289d73315eb2.Speaker: March 7th

df1626a9508fa003.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, March, give me a hand. We should be able to fix it between us.
df1626a9508fa003.Speaker: Dan Heng

35248312a1d40f56.ContentText: ...You might be putting a little too much faith in me, {NICKNAME}.
35248312a1d40f56.Speaker: March 7th

d3300e4d50d98c84.ContentText: Hey. {NICKNAME} and March aren't lying, Clara. I believe them.
d3300e4d50d98c84.Speaker: Bronya

bdc0cd902fdddc7a.ContentText: I also have doubts... But my gut tells me that March, Dan Heng, and {NICKNAME}... They are the new hope this world has been waiting for.
bdc0cd902fdddc7a.Speaker: Bronya

5cb4c64b0fcc188e.ContentText: Hey, sounds like he's willing to communicate! Quick, {NICKNAME}, time to smooth-talk him!
5cb4c64b0fcc188e.Speaker: March 7th

37c85f3ce2a95b6f.ContentText: We've come this far. Out with it already! {NICKNAME}, just be straight with him! Everything depends on it.
37c85f3ce2a95b6f.Speaker: Seele

5c0f66aadcd71938.ContentText: ...I'm ready, {NICKNAME}. Reveal the truth. I'm listening.
5c0f66aadcd71938.Speaker: Bronya

0e1452d3364b31e8.ContentText: ...{NICKNAME}, can I have a word with you? I know that we'll need time to process this new information, but we have to decide on our next plan as soon as possible.
0e1452d3364b31e8.Speaker: Natasha

708a5df3c094d71e.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}. What you've done has brought new hope to the Underworld. Now we have to wait and see... But maybe this will lead to a new lease on life.
708a5df3c094d71e.Speaker: Natasha

a64dc3bff4039388.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, when's the last time you got some rest? I heard that you've been on your feet looking for Svarog since Rivet Town.
a64dc3bff4039388.Speaker: Natasha

549b0b83595beafc.ContentText: Take a good rest while you still can, {NICKNAME}. Your adventures on the surface won't be easy-going.
549b0b83595beafc.Speaker: Natasha

2973d3dcf71bb63a.ContentText: Cheer up, {NICKNAME}! It's not every day someone gets to ride on the Astral Express...
2973d3dcf71bb63a.Speaker: March 7th

e625ae5836a7de63.ContentText: Yes, {NICKNAME} — just like the one that's been placed into your body.
e625ae5836a7de63.Speaker: Welt

1e22de3d0ca6598a.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I'd like to entrust this trailblazing expedition to March, Dan Heng, and you.
1e22de3d0ca6598a.Speaker: Himeko

b2905c6262489043.ContentText: Awesome! We get to work as a team again, {NICKNAME}!
b2905c6262489043.Speaker: March 7th

390dd0872ff806ef.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, March, if you two are ready, why not go and find Dan Heng?
390dd0872ff806ef.Speaker: Himeko

778d269c0d949dab.ContentText: Pom-Pom's so dejected all of a sudden...
778d269c0d949dab.Speaker: playergirl

4f769e34299ba965.ContentText: I see. {NICKNAME}, you should find March. I'll join you two once I'm ready.
4f769e34299ba965.Speaker: Dan Heng

db6b378b6422cdbc.ContentText: Relax, {NICKNAME}! Dan Heng and I are experienced trailblazers! We got your back!
db6b378b6422cdbc.Speaker: March 7th

8b9d5f6ee0a83e7a.ContentText: Have faith in them. Besides, this is {M#his}{F#her} first Trailblazing expedition. How will {M#he}{F#she} be able to look back fondly without a few twists and turns?
8b9d5f6ee0a83e7a.Speaker: Himeko

b4ca5fa81d5c42b8.ContentText: Oh yeah, {NICKNAME}. It feels like... like there are loads of eyes staring at us.
b4ca5fa81d5c42b8.Speaker: March 7th

15e7d164ba3c35e9.ContentText: It's only a Fragmentum illusion. {NICKNAME}, let's get a closer look.
15e7d164ba3c35e9.Speaker: March 7th

a5a75f8c571c9035.ContentText: Or to put it another way, {NICKNAME}... this is one heck of a first Trailblazing expedition! You hit the jackpot!
a5a75f8c571c9035.Speaker: March 7th

ee2d7a3ae1335587.ContentText: In the name of every citizen of Belobog, I command you to rise... Engine of Creation!
ee2d7a3ae1335587.Speaker: playergirl

65524bb8012a92d8.ContentText: But I was fighting Cocolia. Why am I here...?
65524bb8012a92d8.Speaker: playergirl

5110e2dac3873431.ContentText: ...The last time I came here, I drew Nanook's gaze. Could it be...
5110e2dac3873431.Speaker: playergirl

e8bf36ba1100d466.ContentText: This spear... isn't that Cocolia's weapon?
e8bf36ba1100d466.Speaker: playergirl

d8332630d6d7be93.ContentText: {M#Hook seems to be giving me a look like: "I wanna talk to you outside the clinic, now!"}{F#Hook seems to be giving me a look that says: "Hook wants to talk to you outside the clinic, now!"}
d8332630d6d7be93.Speaker: playergirl

f30fdfd56ad42000.ContentText: (So that's why people call eyes the "windows to the soul.")
f30fdfd56ad42000.Speaker: playergirl

007e9923b3399962.ContentText: Hehe, {NICKNAME} helped me to bid for it at the auction! I bought it with the money I got from selling Junjun!
007e9923b3399962.Speaker: Hook

5118cf8b31ed06fb.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, what took you so long? Hook's been waiting here for ages!
5118cf8b31ed06fb.Speaker: Hook

188e82c45c12043e.ContentText: (Let's use the Home-Use Object Finder to help Hook search.)
188e82c45c12043e.Speaker: playergirl

90bd7e1bea024f39.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you go first and Hook will follow! As long as you attract enough attention, I'll be safe from the old witch!
90bd7e1bea024f39.Speaker: Hook

2f398d480f37b39d.ContentText: ...{NICKNAME} helped me find him in the Rivet Town orphanage.
2f398d480f37b39d.Speaker: Hook

09d6529d21182978.ContentText: You had {NICKNAME} take you to the Fragmentum just for this teddy bear? Hook, how many times have I told you...?
09d6529d21182978.Speaker: Natasha

3abfbf9232f29b14.ContentText: G—Great, seeya soon! {NICKNAME}, I'll leave Junjun with you!
3abfbf9232f29b14.Speaker: Hook

66f3a2a6230804d5.ContentText: (It looks like the patients have surrounded Natasha? Let's hear what they're saying...)
66f3a2a6230804d5.Speaker: playergirl

104bcbe9ce1f2393.ContentText: Oh... {NICKNAME}, you're here. I apologize, that must have made for uncomfortable viewing.
104bcbe9ce1f2393.Speaker: Natasha

9dbd186be7dbafbc.ContentText: Forgive me, {NICKNAME}, I'm not good at telling stories. Vache was a terrible brother and a worse doctor... That's all you need to know.
9dbd186be7dbafbc.Speaker: Natasha

f7d6601124a37ab3.ContentText: It's Vache's handwriting. This must be the location of his final lab. {NICKNAME}, come have a look.
f7d6601124a37ab3.Speaker: Natasha

05621d0d9efc13ed.ContentText: Before we leave, {NICKNAME}, I'd like to ask for another favor — the last one, I promise...
05621d0d9efc13ed.Speaker: Natasha

f052e62fcac64300.ContentText: (If we don't keep up with this guy, we might get lost in the blizzard...)
f052e62fcac64300.Speaker: playergirl

d5762c8b36c9e193.ContentText: (The guards will notice if we stray too far off... We should stick close to Gepard.)
d5762c8b36c9e193.Speaker: playergirl

bf89b0b39350e992.ContentText: Agh, gotta stick close to Hook...
bf89b0b39350e992.Speaker: playergirl

9e454845e7416ff0.ContentText: Don't mind {F#her}{M#him}. {F#She}{M#He} likes to get a little creative with {F#her}{M#his} introductions.
9e454845e7416ff0.Speaker: March 7th

b76f1123a2491d16.ContentText: Don't mind {F#her}{M#him}. {F#She}{M#He} likes to get a little creative with {F#her}{M#his} introductions.
b76f1123a2491d16.Speaker: March 7th

78d554462b0c5800.ContentText: If he's on the ship, then Welt, March, and {NICKNAME}... everyone is in grave danger!
78d554462b0c5800.Speaker: Dan Heng

6f321465e6aeac4e.ContentText: What did I tell you, {NICKNAME}? He's definitely sleeping in.
6f321465e6aeac4e.Speaker: March 7th

a0eecd7402ad5f12.ContentText: You drew the short straw, {NICKNAME}. It's your turn to wash the coffee cups this week.
a0eecd7402ad5f12.Speaker: March 7th

c92aae5797bfde5f.ContentText: The three of us actually pulled it off, huh {NICKNAME}!
c92aae5797bfde5f.Speaker: March 7th

802633a872b3beb4.ContentText: In that case... Welt. Ready for a trailblazing expedition? I know you've been itching to get out there for a while now. But make sure you take good care of {NICKNAME} and March.
802633a872b3beb4.Speaker: Himeko

854e62916f4a76d7.ContentText: Oh dear. I'm sorry, my friend here appears to have lost touch with reality.

38b318cdfcdaa2a3.ContentText: Hey {NICKNAME}, we're not on a food tour, remember?
38b318cdfcdaa2a3.Speaker: March 7th

6a54cc9b89c2cbb7.ContentText: ...and I'm sure this pretty young lady won't want to miss out on our Verdant Luna selection. Please, try anything you like...

24087c4c1321d545.ContentText: Hey, {NICKNAME}, remember what we're here for?
24087c4c1321d545.Speaker: March 7th

1547c611a42913b6.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, doesn't look like we're gonna get anything from him. Let's go search somewhere else.
1547c611a42913b6.Speaker: March 7th

63e642c1c678b090.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, can you watch what you're doing!?
63e642c1c678b090.Speaker: March 7th

730289ec76384b8f.ContentText: Just a little persuasion to get them to <color=#dbc291ff>listen to me</color>. But you know all about that already, don't you {NICKNAME}?
730289ec76384b8f.Speaker: Kafka

521e3b3cd3a38666.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, keep your eye on March. We can't let her be impulsive.
521e3b3cd3a38666.Speaker: Welt

62a92b875b6aa2b9.ContentText: Wow... that was a tough trailblazing expedition. Dan Heng, {NICKNAME} — we made it! But, uh, what are we gonna do with the Stellaron? It's usually Mr. Yang who handles it...
62a92b875b6aa2b9.Speaker: March 7th

52e2d30f6fb56bae.ContentText: Thank you {NICKNAME}... I—I'm fine. Don't worry.
52e2d30f6fb56bae.Speaker: Bronya

b0edaa7e752873b5.ContentText: ...Uh, maybe {NICKNAME} should do the talking. I'm no good at serious stuff — I'll probably say something I'll regret.
b0edaa7e752873b5.Speaker: March 7th

2e5aa7e9ff56f838.ContentText: March, Dan Heng, and {NICKNAME}... can I ask for your help again? I want to get this news out to everyone. It'll lift their spirits and bring them hope.
2e5aa7e9ff56f838.Speaker: Natasha

c3de3ae42b6fd314.ContentText: We've gotten to know a lot of Underworlders... {NICKNAME}, who do you think we should start with?
c3de3ae42b6fd314.Speaker: March 7th

c08eff4e9e2d4509.ContentText: March, Dan Heng, {NICKNAME}... it's wonderful you made it to the address.
c08eff4e9e2d4509.Speaker: Bronya

e36b95a18165bcd1.ContentText: You've gone out of your way to save this world. {NICKNAME}, you nearly lost your life. I have no right to ask for more.
e36b95a18165bcd1.Speaker: Bronya

a7f745fccc987f1c.ContentText: The variable in Belobog's fate is still here. Perhaps {F#she}{M#he} can suggest the best solution.

976d72fb24e83314.ContentText: Okay. I... I trust your judgment.
976d72fb24e83314.Speaker: Clara

96318b02253ba7a1.ContentText: I should tell Hook about the Geomarrow Probe... She might want to help Fersman get his treasure back.
96318b02253ba7a1.Speaker: playergirl

2f00e4287a68551f.ContentText: Glad to be of service. Now then... did you really bring {NICKNAME} over here with you just to pick up Junjun? Come on now, what are you guys up to this time?
2f00e4287a68551f.Speaker: Natasha

ed9bac22388fbcc8.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I'm going to have to trouble you to keep an eye on this kid again. You seem to be doing a good job, so I'll leave it at that.
ed9bac22388fbcc8.Speaker: Natasha

88ed946c1230624b.ContentText: Of course we'd like to bid! I'll sign again! {NICKNAME}, ask about the probe!
88ed946c1230624b.Speaker: Hook

8f2daf428d190d1a.ContentText: (The gemologist will be bidding too. Hook's teddy bear may be the center of attention.)
8f2daf428d190d1a.Speaker: playergirl

e3ce8b1c06d84efb.ContentText: (We could find the auctioneer now and wait for the bidding to begin...)
e3ce8b1c06d84efb.Speaker: playergirl

4edd0d9702674c24.ContentText: (...Although there is still some time left. <color=#dbc291ff>We could also see if we missed any buyers...</color>)
4edd0d9702674c24.Speaker: playergirl

8b24d826e64be58d.ContentText: (So Gertie's hunting for children's toys? Maybe we can persuade her to bid on Hook's teddy bear too.)
8b24d826e64be58d.Speaker: playergirl

cb98d80f9c35360f.ContentText: Huh, looks like someone's trying to be a hero. Boss, they look rich. We should rob them, too!

3816504110ca69ae.ContentText: Huh? Who the heck are you? Boss, these two must have more money than this brat. Let's rob them instead!

18169e9951f1dc59.ContentText: Huh, looks like two new brats showed up. We'll just have to teach you a lesson as well! Boss, they look rich. Let's rob them too!

8c1349405cb421d0.ContentText: Thanks so much guys! I gotta go!

0931f5b8e9b03c22.ContentText: Grandma, grandma! They're the ones who saved me.

02788df4f6225900.ContentText: If grandma wins the auction, don't tell your parents I bought it! Let's pretend it was a gift from this kind {F#young lady}{M#young man}.

52ba4c711df6b64c.ContentText: ...A break? {NICKNAME}, do you think there's something wrong with the Geomarrow Probe?
52ba4c711df6b64c.Speaker: Hook

1f36a8af9c7bcc92.ContentText: Fool! What the honorary member means is that the thief only came here to create trouble — they weren't interested in buying or selling! Right, {NICKNAME}?
1f36a8af9c7bcc92.Speaker: Hook

9e4bec6d0af5b17e.ContentText: We're gonna win it at the auction, fair and square! Let's go, {NICKNAME}!
9e4bec6d0af5b17e.Speaker: Hook

1356eb6ce1c5f5f4.ContentText: Argh, {NICKNAME}! Everyone's looking at us! What should we do?
1356eb6ce1c5f5f4.Speaker: Hook

a705ef1da2e0ed7c.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, thank you so much... Hook would never have won the probe without your help!
a705ef1da2e0ed7c.Speaker: Hook

b7b1670a3a4e7de2.ContentText: We've got some money left over — let's use it on the old witch. She helped Hook repair Junjun, so Hook's gonna treat her to some stone-grilled olm! As for you, {NICKNAME}... you've earned Hook's verbal praise!
b7b1670a3a4e7de2.Speaker: Hook

3fe6b23b7795d190.ContentText: Anyway, enough about The Moles... Thanks for the help, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}!
3fe6b23b7795d190.Speaker: Hook

fbfd9e8ae91fee17.ContentText: Thanks for the help, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}.
fbfd9e8ae91fee17.Speaker: Hook

3887c5dee481827a.ContentText: Thanks for the help, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}.
3887c5dee481827a.Speaker: Hook

a94c6886f8bb4fe8.ContentText: Thanks for the help, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}.
a94c6886f8bb4fe8.Speaker: Hook

68dfe4ce65537238.ContentText: By the way, Hook, how are your birthday party plans coming along? Have you invited this {F#young lady}{M#young man}?
68dfe4ce65537238.Speaker: Natasha

34e236590209118b.ContentText: Oh! Not yet! {NICKNAME}, do you wanna come to my birthday party?
34e236590209118b.Speaker: Hook

eb8caba919e3a5d7.ContentText: By the way, Hook, how are your birthday party plans coming along? Have you invited this {F#young lady}{M#young man}?
eb8caba919e3a5d7.Speaker: Natasha

26a549d5c2af812e.ContentText: I also invited the old witch, Swetta, aaaand... you, of course! The honorary member {NICKNAME}!
26a549d5c2af812e.Speaker: Hook

6fa69438cfd10106.ContentText: Today is an extra special day. In addition to The Moles, Hook has invited a dear and brave new friend. {NICKNAME}, I hope you have a wonderful time at the party today!

929f7a2df3b5dc5b.ContentText: Good, that's good... And you, {F#young lady}{M#young man}, are you hurt? Thank you for your help...

3fb0512a75fe5afa.ContentText: Quit acting tough, {F#young lady}{M#young man}. Your injuries must be treated right away.

17a91c42d5a300b5.ContentText: Don't be afraid, {F#young lady}{M#young man}. Your injury isn't fatal.

df038b72486c4c3c.ContentText: ...Hook wasn't the one that caused trouble. It was those bad guys! We were just defending ourselves, ask {NICKNAME}!
df038b72486c4c3c.Speaker: Hook

d2f5cb117e13b8cb.ContentText: Alright then! I'll be waiting for you at the shelter in the mine, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}!
d2f5cb117e13b8cb.Speaker: Hook

a63badd6263a03a6.ContentText: Too slow, {NICKNAME}, Honorary Member of The Moles! You should have gotten here before Hook!
a63badd6263a03a6.Speaker: Hook

8381e0501dc79ec9.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, let's tell Seele to take him away!
8381e0501dc79ec9.Speaker: Hook

f6ba7285ef6cadd3.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, let's go into town to find him!
f6ba7285ef6cadd3.Speaker: Hook

7222f1d2b912dd2e.ContentText: {NICKNAME} and Hook helped daddy catch the thief that stole it!
7222f1d2b912dd2e.Speaker: Hook

ec16f9481a8f5cde.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you're not allowed to see Hook cry! Go away!
ec16f9481a8f5cde.Speaker: Hook

4fc791f3c30d036b.ContentText: Aw, crud. One of us is gonna blurt something out or get something wrong, I just know it...
4fc791f3c30d036b.Speaker: March 7th

dba57decf8557924.ContentText: {NICKNAME} is right. If we're too scripted, it'll sound like we're hiding something.
dba57decf8557924.Speaker: Welt

ef1b131681348651.ContentText: I have heard of you, {NICKNAME}... The Alliance is very interested in the Astral Express.
ef1b131681348651.Speaker: Jing Yuan

1ea5e58dc772cdbe.ContentText: What do you make of this Jing Yuan?
1ea5e58dc772cdbe.Speaker: March 7th

d295c2a4fb50bbc2.ContentText: {F#You think everyone's suspicious... though they do say some girls have a sixth sense.}{M#Come on, you think everyone's suspicious...}
d295c2a4fb50bbc2.Speaker: March 7th

015b449ef62f000e.ContentText: Oh, let's let the Express know how we're doing~
015b449ef62f000e.Speaker: March 7th

feafa17731861dda.ContentText: Y'know, you're talking my language. B—But I liked your explanation too, Mr. Yang, hehe...
feafa17731861dda.Speaker: March 7th

5117437da8371d9f.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you, me, and Mr. Yang can make up our own team: The Stellaron Medics!
5117437da8371d9f.Speaker: March 7th

169d42e899b513ab.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, March, this area saw fierce fighting only recently.
169d42e899b513ab.Speaker: Welt

4d02197b19d1ab6d.ContentText: Let {NICKNAME} do it. A bat's not as good as a crowbar, but it's definitely better than your fingers.
4d02197b19d1ab6d.Speaker: March 7th

7f42dd2f1760070e.ContentText: She's exhausted! Quick, we need to think of something... {NICKNAME}, help me out here!
7f42dd2f1760070e.Speaker: March 7th

6a37fa3c4a81b8ef.ContentText: So, {NICKNAME}, wanna tell us what happened back there? Don't think you can just reappear on the battlefield with a cool weapon in your hands and skip the story.
6a37fa3c4a81b8ef.Speaker: March 7th

5386dfb4a8731579.ContentText: {NICKNAME} probably doesn't know what happened either. This wouldn't be the first time... Something similar happened when we faced the Doomsday Beast on the space station. Remember that glance from Nanook?
5386dfb4a8731579.Speaker: Dan Heng

2ed585b94fa798ee.ContentText: Ugh, can we focus? {NICKNAME}, tell them the good news already!
2ed585b94fa798ee.Speaker: March 7th

cae9b20b3b02b26d.ContentText: Hehe... {NICKNAME}, do you wanna do the honors?
cae9b20b3b02b26d.Speaker: March 7th

0cab6cfda45aee94.ContentText: ...Y'know, we've got some good news for you, haven't we, {NICKNAME}?
0cab6cfda45aee94.Speaker: March 7th

f24f19ff283e37b7.ContentText: No way! After all our hard work, how could we miss out on the final celebration? Right, {NICKNAME}?
f24f19ff283e37b7.Speaker: March 7th

2b490b91fe5ea244.ContentText: Oh, uh, I'm afraid you might have to make an exception, {F#miss}{M#mr}. My license has expired, but then I haven't had the chance to go up and renew it for <unbreak>10</unbreak> years now...

507d5b351c81c2c2.ContentText: Congrats, {NICKNAME}! That was one heck of a first trailblazing expedition!
507d5b351c81c2c2.Speaker: March 7th

08dddcb3b45341b8.ContentText: Ugh! Anyway, we should be asking {NICKNAME}... Any thoughts you want to share?
08dddcb3b45341b8.Speaker: March 7th

bfbe9d89b6ee3e35.ContentText: We should be getting back to the Express. Time to find March and Dan Heng.
bfbe9d89b6ee3e35.Speaker: playergirl

1f3e94fb0cdebc34.ContentText: Morning, {NICKNAME}! How did you sleep? I'm full of energy myself!
1f3e94fb0cdebc34.Speaker: March 7th

56bc0684d67fe317.ContentText: How have you been, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}? Miss Serval's workshop is amazing — there are all kinds of things... I like it here a lot!
56bc0684d67fe317.Speaker: Clara

6500411a88e15272.ContentText: Th—Thanks Miss Serval! {F#Big sister}{M#Big brother} {NICKNAME}, March, Dan Heng... Thanks for taking care of me. Safe travels.
6500411a88e15272.Speaker: Clara

4d0b0e622f093124.ContentText: I don't know if you've ever had that feeling, {NICKNAME}... When you stop and look back on the things you've done, and wonder at all the obstacles you've overcome, the strength you've displayed...
4d0b0e622f093124.Speaker: Natasha

e386a6367388bc78.ContentText: Are you also here to look into this case, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}? Perhaps if we work together we can uncover some clues that I missed...
e386a6367388bc78.Speaker: Clara

8c89852a088ce303.ContentText: Are you also here to look into this case, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}? Perhaps if we work together we can uncover some clues that I missed...
8c89852a088ce303.Speaker: Clara

2483ab4729833fc2.ContentText: ...Th—That look on your face is a bit scary...
2483ab4729833fc2.Speaker: Clara

5a37fa065d7e861f.ContentText: You sound so cool, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}... You're like one of the characters from Mr. Svarog's movies. Aren't they called detectives?
5a37fa065d7e861f.Speaker: Clara

7093ce2ff5a551be.ContentText: Seeing you so fired up has me excited, too. Now, let's get started.
7093ce2ff5a551be.Speaker: Clara

6218bce44702148c.ContentText: But actually... I think it's cool, too! Now, let's get started, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}!
6218bce44702148c.Speaker: Clara

f31802d002cd9d1a.ContentText: Em... This nickname is a bit embarrassing...
f31802d002cd9d1a.Speaker: Clara

9481f7ad1bdff934.ContentText: Oh, you're right, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}! I see! I'll jot it down...
9481f7ad1bdff934.Speaker: Clara

283f68244f49002a.ContentText: Hmm... I'm struggling to make sense of these clues. Do you have any thoughts, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}?
283f68244f49002a.Speaker: Clara

f075a00b0b37ff58.ContentText: I'm sorry! {F#She}{M#He} was just joking... Please don't take {F#Her}{M#Him} seriously!
f075a00b0b37ff58.Speaker: Clara

dc34372dcd94a0b1.ContentText: Oh! You've figured it out. But how are we going to track down someone with such an unusual appearance?
dc34372dcd94a0b1.Speaker: Clara

53492d412461840e.ContentText: This is a crucial clue! {F#Big sister}{M#Big brother}, Let's go investigate the crime scene together!
53492d412461840e.Speaker: Clara

1ef86614d60faa36.ContentText: I think he ran that way. No one has touched the crime scene, so any traces he left behind should still be there... P—Please catch the thief for us.

3e3e4a4e578335ef.ContentText: Take a look at these marks... These are very suspicious. Could they have been left by the culprit?
3e3e4a4e578335ef.Speaker: Clara

ffea587ba03ccc5b.ContentText: The tracks stop here... I guess we'll have to look around for other clues.
ffea587ba03ccc5b.Speaker: Clara

5622d003cf1913ed.ContentText: O—Okay! I'll follow you, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}.
5622d003cf1913ed.Speaker: Clara

37dc5dcdd4eb910d.ContentText: Hmm, it appears we're thinking the same thing...
37dc5dcdd4eb910d.Speaker: Clara

908610c2f577fa7b.ContentText: Ah, wait, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}! Look! It doesn't appear to be trying to flee or attack us...
908610c2f577fa7b.Speaker: Clara

aae5eefdbfed300c.ContentText: Don't be scared! Look! It doesn't seem like it wants to hurt us...
aae5eefdbfed300c.Speaker: Clara

870b7c67d06e516f.ContentText: What should we do? We gotta stop it! But, please don't be too rough on it! I'll figure out a way to repair it later...
870b7c67d06e516f.Speaker: Clara

8210043dfd0e3658.ContentText: It's great that you understand what I'm saying...
8210043dfd0e3658.Speaker: Clara

6dce9b60bf6ad7b1.ContentText: That's not the word I'd use.
6dce9b60bf6ad7b1.Speaker: Clara

b9d9cc57411f372a.ContentText: I guess most people only see robots as tools. I'll try not to hold it against you.
b9d9cc57411f372a.Speaker: Clara

9184bcae9213035b.ContentText: I'm gonna return the parts to the vagrants first, then I'll check on the little fella. Can I trust you to find a shell in the machine graveyard, {NICKNAME}?
9184bcae9213035b.Speaker: Clara

3e9593ab145b81fa.ContentText: Really? You could have what it takes to be a prospector, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}.
3e9593ab145b81fa.Speaker: Clara

af5a365328954f68.ContentText: Then I'll entrust this task to you, {NICKNAME}.
af5a365328954f68.Speaker: Clara

5f90f3a075e4f257.ContentText: Look for Toby at the front entrance. His appearance is... crude, but he's the robot most familiar with the machine graveyard. Just follow Toby.
5f90f3a075e4f257.Speaker: Clara

0ff73266d4ec77d1.ContentText: (That is such an odd reason to be scrapped...)
0ff73266d4ec77d1.Speaker: playergirl

5f68635d5984004a.ContentText: (However, the shell appears to be in good condition, so I'll bring it with me.)
5f68635d5984004a.Speaker: playergirl

8947b06c6319382b.ContentText: (Robot pet battles sound a little frightening...)
8947b06c6319382b.Speaker: playergirl

cbaaf2e6261af954.ContentText: (The inside of the armor is a total mess due to being melted by the heat. Unfortunately, it appears to be useless.)
cbaaf2e6261af954.Speaker: playergirl

e7bd3436c0ef4aed.ContentText: Oh, {NICKNAME}, you're back already? How did it go? Did Toby help you find a shell?
e7bd3436c0ef4aed.Speaker: Clara

8283787039c5dc63.ContentText: But it shouldn't matter. The structures of these small robots are nearly identical. Thank you for bringing this to me, {NICKNAME}.
8283787039c5dc63.Speaker: Clara

73c07d55af9a1d77.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, watch out! It's out of control!
73c07d55af9a1d77.Speaker: Clara

c819623a2bf11616.ContentText: Phew... that was close. Fortunately, Mr. Svarog and {NICKNAME} acted fast...
c819623a2bf11616.Speaker: Clara

2c0d45d4fde3d042.ContentText: I'm also curious about where this little fella came from. Could you please come back later, {NICKNAME}?
2c0d45d4fde3d042.Speaker: Clara

e30cdc5df3986503.ContentText: I need to look into something... I may require your assistance.
e30cdc5df3986503.Speaker: Clara

eb1040c447e94cf8.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}! I'll text you when this little fella is fixed.
eb1040c447e94cf8.Speaker: Clara

5dac060108f8b0bd.ContentText: (I should come back to Clara later.)
5dac060108f8b0bd.Speaker: playergirl

a382bfe73699ae4c.ContentText: (Looks like it hasn't gone back to normal yet... I should come back later.)
a382bfe73699ae4c.Speaker: playergirl

58f927460cd36060.ContentText: Oh look, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}! Pascal is greeting you. It's just... his speech is still a little confusing.
58f927460cd36060.Speaker: Clara

dc002c673fe19392.ContentText: Mr. Svarog, could you give me a little more time? I want to investigate this further. If we don't find anything, you can integrate Pascal into the network.
dc002c673fe19392.Speaker: Clara

1899b57bd2670d1c.ContentText: I know this is asking a lot...
1899b57bd2670d1c.Speaker: Clara

e65465e907987baf.ContentText: But... it's very important to me! Please... help me one more time.
e65465e907987baf.Speaker: Clara

aa43735923e2e0ce.ContentText: Oh, th—thanks then... I'm so sorry to trouble you again, {NICKNAME}!
aa43735923e2e0ce.Speaker: Clara

0f83d028c15c7d4c.ContentText: Hey, {NICKNAME}, take a look over there!
0f83d028c15c7d4c.Speaker: Clara

7817f15f26217282.ContentText: Although it doesn't seem to be functioning, you should still be cautious when approaching it...
7817f15f26217282.Speaker: Clara

e01ccb42052963c3.ContentText: Oh no, it's still active. Watch out!
e01ccb42052963c3.Speaker: Clara

004d3c906368c730.ContentText: This big fella is completely out of control... Let's quiet him down!
004d3c906368c730.Speaker: Clara

bfca28dfd7d60cb7.ContentText: Hmm, then all that's left is to drag the shell back.
bfca28dfd7d60cb7.Speaker: Clara

08975af950c12837.ContentText: Thank you, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}. It makes me happy to hear that.
08975af950c12837.Speaker: Clara

b6c80d0a4ad609d6.ContentText: I know. You and Mr. Svarog have helped me so much, someone needs to do the same for those poor robots... I've got to do my best.
b6c80d0a4ad609d6.Speaker: Clara

fb602cdf116d223f.ContentText: Welcome back, Clara. I've completed my further analysis of this robot.

faa23b548f55b8c1.ContentText: Pascal... Did he run off towards Rivet Town? Let's follow him!
faa23b548f55b8c1.Speaker: Clara

ecf8170482109160.ContentText: (Svarog thinks that formatting Pascal's data and integrating him into the base's network is necessary, but doing so will deprive Pascal of his special emotional intelligence.)
ecf8170482109160.Speaker: playergirl

e34168f5c62aa07b.ContentText: (Although it may sound cruel, this approach best prevents Pascal from posing a threat...)
e34168f5c62aa07b.Speaker: playergirl

95a468dbe48df921.ContentText: (Clara thinks she can use programming to control Pascal's behavior and prevent him from causing harm while keeping his emotional intelligence intact. However, this doesn't address the root of the issue, and it also requires Clara to devote much time and effort to Pascal.)
95a468dbe48df921.Speaker: playergirl

07bf6d1424d74e77.ContentText: (Although Clara will use Pascal's emotional intelligence to help guide him in the right direction, Pascal could still go out of control in the future.)
07bf6d1424d74e77.Speaker: playergirl

8a97b600a59e370d.ContentText: (In addition, Pascal has a history of stealing, even though he never caused any harm to anyone. This is also a major concern.)
8a97b600a59e370d.Speaker: playergirl

28120f76522aa483.ContentText: (What is most important here? I need to think carefully and choose one solution, then persuade the other person.)
28120f76522aa483.Speaker: playergirl

02057e7e430a4f38.ContentText: But I'd like to know why you went with Mr. Svarog's solution.
02057e7e430a4f38.Speaker: Clara

8572698052e090c6.ContentText: Do you truly believe that, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}?
8572698052e090c6.Speaker: Clara

ff52c8f2c84c4233.ContentText: However, I respect your point of view. I admit I might not be as rational as Mr. Svarog, and don't think things through as much...
ff52c8f2c84c4233.Speaker: Clara

e26ad930fce36ac5.ContentText: So, could you please talk more about your point of view? I'd like to hear some different perspectives.
e26ad930fce36ac5.Speaker: Clara

747c1412f198219d.ContentText: Are you trying to say... equality means you have to consider others' interests first?
747c1412f198219d.Speaker: Clara

7b84c07b318b3e31.ContentText: I appreciate you taking the time to speak with me. This decision is much harder than I expected, but I've finally made my mind up.
7b84c07b318b3e31.Speaker: Clara

48a6293fa403778b.ContentText: Tell me when you're ready to make a decision.
48a6293fa403778b.Speaker: Clara

e70967f6e0837c7b.ContentText: ...I see. In that case, let's go back to the base.
e70967f6e0837c7b.Speaker: Clara

983afd094a3143df.ContentText: (I think it's over... I'll check in with Clara later to see what's up.)
983afd094a3143df.Speaker: playergirl

cdebc48af014b38f.ContentText: Oh, it's you! I wanted to show you something... These little fellas.
cdebc48af014b38f.Speaker: Clara

47eb193c33db7bad.ContentText: Thank, you! Long time, no see! {NICKNAME} friend, Clara friend!

821371a2242345f3.ContentText: ...I discovered that whenever I mentioned your name to Mr. Svarog, these guys at the base would get really happy.
821371a2242345f3.Speaker: Clara

a6951da9e6b229ac.ContentText: Don't worry, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}. I don't think it's a bad thing, because...
a6951da9e6b229ac.Speaker: Clara

4c96bd371fbcd8bf.ContentText: ...Oh, it's you! I'm just doing a checkup on Pascal.
4c96bd371fbcd8bf.Speaker: Clara

f0e29b150c0cdc09.ContentText: Would you like to speak with Pascal?
f0e29b150c0cdc09.Speaker: Clara

c1148cbd0efce665.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}! Your, life, happy! Pascal, happy!

06b0e19a0dfe1ac7.ContentText: Thank you, thank you! Thank you, Clara, {NICKNAME}!

fde9560287945a70.ContentText: Umm... {F#big sister}{M#big brother}, would you like a flower?
fde9560287945a70.Speaker: Clara

b96f03beda124695.ContentText: (My choice will have a direct impact on the outcome... I should mull it over.)
b96f03beda124695.Speaker: playergirl

c3fc2fc9fe6bd180.ContentText: Phew... Luckily, the patrol robot and Pascal's cores are still intact. The big fella's shell is only slightly dented... Thank you for your help.
c3fc2fc9fe6bd180.Speaker: Clara

6176413faaf7c54e.ContentText: Oh, I almost forgot. Thank you for reminding me!
6176413faaf7c54e.Speaker: Clara

61a1a4e93378f78c.ContentText: Also, there's dust all over the place, but none of the equipment appears to be deteriorating.
61a1a4e93378f78c.Speaker: Clara

1495a2e94ea6ac5e.ContentText: ...Right. That bigger robot said that, how strange...
1495a2e94ea6ac5e.Speaker: Clara

fcb035f31afb9890.ContentText: ...Right. Pascal is doing this out of good will, but still...
fcb035f31afb9890.Speaker: Clara

747aeac1ddb444e2.ContentText: Let's take a look around again, {F#big sister}{M#big brother}. I'm still not finished here.
747aeac1ddb444e2.Speaker: Clara

11c51243649d54a7.ContentText: Let me think... How about we go over Pascal's whole story again, from the start?
11c51243649d54a7.Speaker: Clara

db3f61329d0f0742.ContentText: {F#Big sister}{M#Big brother}, let's go back to Mr. Svarog and talk about what to do next.
db3f61329d0f0742.Speaker: Clara

ee074e773b2ac1b2.ContentText: In that case... I have nothing against it either. Mind you, if Madam Herta was to do something to you, {NICKNAME}...
ee074e773b2ac1b2.Speaker: Asta

287ff0cbc48b2293.ContentText: Take care, {NICKNAME}. We'll come back now and then to see you.
287ff0cbc48b2293.Speaker: Himeko

e5bde6be05c1c160.ContentText: You came at a good time, {NICKNAME}, there is something you can help me with.
e5bde6be05c1c160.Speaker: Natasha

9b92ee62500a7dac.ContentText: Can I entrust you with this task, {NICKNAME}?
9b92ee62500a7dac.Speaker: Natasha

1d754be6b94a7da3.ContentText: Good luck, {NICKNAME}. I'll be sure to thank you properly when you're back.
1d754be6b94a7da3.Speaker: Natasha

8cdff81be3f67c8d.ContentText: (Avoiding a follow-up visit due to money issues...)
8cdff81be3f67c8d.Speaker: playergirl

5e609413df868c96.ContentText: (I should find another patient to talk to...)
5e609413df868c96.Speaker: playergirl

0a07af2f632f93f7.ContentText: (Avoiding a follow-up visit due to her husband...)
0a07af2f632f93f7.Speaker: playergirl

53ca0f747c6d8108.ContentText: (I should find another patient to talk to...)
53ca0f747c6d8108.Speaker: playergirl

97ecaaf722e63ea1.ContentText: (I know where to find the wonder medicine. What should I do next...?)
97ecaaf722e63ea1.Speaker: playergirl

90e8cf378ac3a41a.ContentText: (That patient didn't want me to tell Natasha about this... Should I listen to him?)
90e8cf378ac3a41a.Speaker: playergirl

fadb5e3f7cf92568.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}. Those patients weren't exactly singing my praises — thank you for having faith in me.
fadb5e3f7cf92568.Speaker: Natasha

e589ab110482e5fb.ContentText: (That medicine seller sure shut up shop in a hurry...)
e589ab110482e5fb.Speaker: playergirl

ffe9894bcef81b8c.ContentText: (I should head back and report to Natasha.)
ffe9894bcef81b8c.Speaker: playergirl

86712c118646e70b.ContentText: I don't blame you, {NICKNAME}. After everything you heard, I'm grateful you came back to find me. Your trust is important to me.
86712c118646e70b.Speaker: Natasha

50fe172c61484de6.ContentText: I'm guessing you've heard a lot of different opinions on Vache. What do you make of him, {NICKNAME}?
50fe172c61484de6.Speaker: Natasha

92eaa7eabe0f9e40.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I want you to go and visit another patient — a victim of the wonder medicine... I want you to see the real consequences of abusing that medicine.
92eaa7eabe0f9e40.Speaker: Natasha

d7376aaee12a44a1.ContentText: Let me tell you a story, {NICKNAME}.
d7376aaee12a44a1.Speaker: Natasha

0bb6c75cd258230f.ContentText: I cannot accept that their fate was simply the result of misfortune or risk, {NICKNAME}. No true doctor would accept that.
0bb6c75cd258230f.Speaker: Natasha

f2284703a869d65e.ContentText: Go, {NICKNAME}. I'll be waiting for the good news.
f2284703a869d65e.Speaker: Natasha

42d72b43d9840a36.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}. Your actions today have saved many Underworld families.
42d72b43d9840a36.Speaker: Natasha

6afad8bb90f115fb.ContentText: If possible, I would like you to go with me, {NICKNAME}.
6afad8bb90f115fb.Speaker: Natasha

3cea26e952606d65.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, look at the busy flow of people — life in the Overworld carries on as usual, as if nothing has happened.
3cea26e952606d65.Speaker: Natasha

4ad9f786c0873daf.ContentText: I want to buy my mom a gift. {NICKNAME}, you're more of an Overworld local than I am now. Any suggestions?
4ad9f786c0873daf.Speaker: Natasha

4085be04f8d05592.ContentText: Flowers it is then, {NICKNAME}. Can you lead the way?
4085be04f8d05592.Speaker: Natasha

2069480042e8ec90.ContentText: Do you want to hear a flower story, {NICKNAME}?
2069480042e8ec90.Speaker: Natasha

558dc9bfdd53d7d9.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, will you choose some flowers for my mom?
558dc9bfdd53d7d9.Speaker: Natasha

aeda49a8b101c722.ContentText: It's alright, {NICKNAME}. I was prepared... Although it still hurts to hear it from mom.
aeda49a8b101c722.Speaker: Natasha

f8349a18d23833e8.ContentText: Let's head back to the Underworld, {NICKNAME}. We need to spread the good news.
f8349a18d23833e8.Speaker: Natasha

1ace87c00e898c23.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I need to leave the city to recover my brother's research data. Are you willing to come with me?
1ace87c00e898c23.Speaker: Natasha

78a7747d6e23d035.ContentText: This {F#young lady}{M#young gentleman} is right. Danger is everywhere beyond the walls of Belobog...

0699989c13cb61e2.ContentText: I know, Mr. Oswell. But I have a hero with me — {F#she}{M#he} saved the Underworld. I'm sure {F#she'll}{M#he'll} protect me, right?
0699989c13cb61e2.Speaker: Natasha

3d6bb93abaaeccc4.ContentText: ...Ignore me... I'm just talking to myself. Let's go, {NICKNAME}. It's time to face my past head-on.
3d6bb93abaaeccc4.Speaker: Natasha

c3e0fab5541e019b.ContentText: Let's hurry up, {NICKNAME}. We need to find any clues that Vache may have left behind before both of us become ice sculptures.
c3e0fab5541e019b.Speaker: Natasha

917563baa320feb6.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I want to go deeper into the Snow Plains. Can you press on any further?
917563baa320feb6.Speaker: Natasha

f18b0207cd6f586a.ContentText: Ah, I'd almost forgotten... No one can leave Belobog without authorization. Looks like we need to talk our way out of this, {NICKNAME}.
f18b0207cd6f586a.Speaker: Natasha

3678681370e6cdfe.ContentText: I'm ready, {NICKNAME}. The doctor's got your back.
3678681370e6cdfe.Speaker: Natasha

7c812c4a75be09cc.ContentText: Can you feel it, {NICKNAME}? It seems like Vache's medicine is working.
7c812c4a75be09cc.Speaker: Natasha

da4295d41c0c1a36.ContentText: That'll do. Thank you for helping me, {NICKNAME}. I feel like a great weight has been lifted.
da4295d41c0c1a36.Speaker: Natasha

4ee3701326c7d1d1.ContentText: Nice pick, {NICKNAME}. I wonder if dad still sends mom flowers on their anniversary...
4ee3701326c7d1d1.Speaker: Natasha

13b79a1d1f9c3658.ContentText: Nice pick, {NICKNAME}. Dad's not young anymore, he probably doesn't have to do operations solo these days. I hope he's looking after himself...
13b79a1d1f9c3658.Speaker: Natasha

4b81623663ad372a.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}. To be honest with you, it reminds me of Vache... Don't worry, good memories only.
4b81623663ad372a.Speaker: Natasha

b7c3f1bf30443034.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}. It reminds me of carefree childhood days... Those times were pure and innocent, just like these petals.
b7c3f1bf30443034.Speaker: Natasha

0604e266d490df73.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, can I talk to you for a moment? I have a favor to ask. Something... rather personal.
0604e266d490df73.Speaker: Natasha

6b6dde788eb3d674.ContentText: That hardly sounds like you, {NICKNAME}. What about that Stellaron inside you? Don't you wanna get rid of it?
6b6dde788eb3d674.Speaker: Himeko

099cf8da5d60651d.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, what do you think about all this?
099cf8da5d60651d.Speaker: Himeko

6493d6aeac3c18d4.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, did you notice that Kafka didn't mention anything to do with you...?
6493d6aeac3c18d4.Speaker: Himeko

46ad985347e552a7.ContentText: You must be extra vigilant, {NICKNAME}. Kafka won't always turn a blind eye.
46ad985347e552a7.Speaker: Himeko

b3cd721afabe7854.ContentText: I'm so mad! She just hijacks our communications and then hangs up? So rude! {NICKNAME}, you used to know her, right? Was she always like this?
b3cd721afabe7854.Speaker: March 7th

f819b19ba98ff6d1.ContentText: Pfft, taking things seriously all of a sudden...?
f819b19ba98ff6d1.Speaker: March 7th

f1f5ea3e3bdb10cd.ContentText: Have a safe trip you guys!

470f7690b8eb6f10.ContentText: (I wonder if she even remembers we've got a job to do down there...)
470f7690b8eb6f10.Speaker: playergirl

cdc533d0e600a991.ContentText: Ahem... {NICKNAME}, did you receive the destination overview? Excited?

9bbc72b60cfd163b.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, if you're ready, head over to the front of the train. The meeting is about to start!

cf1848a634ac3ff1.ContentText: (Looks like Mr. Yang really can't see it...)
cf1848a634ac3ff1.Speaker: playergirl

95a1dc00c49b7698.ContentText: (Seems like I'm the only one who can see it...)
95a1dc00c49b7698.Speaker: playergirl

61b95c5a33dd228e.ContentText: There is actually something that I need. So I'll get right to it. {NICKNAME}, the Garden of Recollection wants to preserve your memories.

7f03fd490520f03e.ContentText: Perfect! Thank you, {NICKNAME}. I'm glad you're so pleasant to work with.

4c87f85c0be2976f.ContentText: Yeah, these creatures do suddenly pop up sometimes and start questioning the first person they see... {NICKNAME}, what did it ask you?
4c87f85c0be2976f.Speaker: Welt

79a43979d0591ec9.ContentText: Thank you, {NICKNAME}. I'm sorry you had to lie, but please do understand... We have our own rules at the Garden of Recollection.

680f2e8f18e3c10b.ContentText: *chuckles* Although Welt and I didn't get the chance to go with you, I can tell you worked hard to bring things back to normal. Well done, everybody. And especially you, {NICKNAME}. I heard a lot of good things about you.
680f2e8f18e3c10b.Speaker: Himeko

7488aa6850ac7840.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, about your battle against the Supreme Guardian and the whole Stellaron situation, you must have a lot of unanswered questions, I suppose?
7488aa6850ac7840.Speaker: Himeko

e879902e318c8ae5.ContentText: (...So strange. Seems like Asta and Arlan are in trouble...)
e879902e318c8ae5.Speaker: playergirl

ba586e3bbbfdc04e.ContentText: (Still, it all sounds like hearsay to me. Better keep them in the dark for now.)
ba586e3bbbfdc04e.Speaker: playergirl

f66960cb9fb35b2f.ContentText: (Himeko seems to be on good terms with the folks on the space station. Maybe I should tell her first.)
f66960cb9fb35b2f.Speaker: playergirl

f9ce305d92276e41.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, are you thinking of getting involved?
f9ce305d92276e41.Speaker: Himeko

1cde5cc60f71cc80.ContentText: (I can't see anyone slacking off... Maybe Gossipmonger isn't around?)
1cde5cc60f71cc80.Speaker: playergirl

9a57bc93fd237ff9.ContentText: (The rumors are already circulating. Let's gather some intel first.)
9a57bc93fd237ff9.Speaker: playergirl

58251c4f0fa515e0.ContentText: It's okay. It's just a picture. I don't mind. Go ahead, {NICKNAME}.
58251c4f0fa515e0.Speaker: Himeko

484663b2df259830.ContentText: Let me see... Hey, you're pretty good, {NICKNAME}.
484663b2df259830.Speaker: Himeko

577cf74b3d194e4c.ContentText: That might be the whistleblower's so-called "evidence." Looks like you don't have much time to lose, {NICKNAME}.
577cf74b3d194e4c.Speaker: Himeko

0201a3217b756b13.ContentText: (Seems like it's all just a scare...)
0201a3217b756b13.Speaker: playergirl

4e9b05d42b706574.ContentText: (But it's easy to make rumors and hard to dispel them. I better let Asta know.)
4e9b05d42b706574.Speaker: playergirl

7c179740af568fbf.ContentText: (She said... a young man with <color=#dbc291ff>black-rimmed glasses and a slanted fringe</color>.)
7c179740af568fbf.Speaker: playergirl

65cb3d44b0a81129.ContentText: I—If the money wasn't spent, then it doesn't count! Anyway, {NICKNAME}, are you here for something?
65cb3d44b0a81129.Speaker: Asta

563b682b566ba44f.ContentText: Enough chit-chat, {NICKNAME}. I am working on a big project with a few colleagues. If we succeed, it will answer the ultimate question that's been puzzling us for thousands of Amber Eras: the truth about Aeons.
563b682b566ba44f.Speaker: Herta

4e65acca1eddd805.ContentText: How were they created? Why were they created? What were they created for? {NICKNAME}, have ever you thought about these questions?
4e65acca1eddd805.Speaker: Herta

1e194ab7b0ef9ceb.ContentText: Well indeed, it's got nothing to do with you, but we need you. Give me some time, {NICKNAME}, I'll make this worthwhile for you too.
1e194ab7b0ef9ceb.Speaker: Herta

8b6c74b30ad03860.ContentText: Then {NICKNAME} and I will fight for you... until your heart is ready.
8b6c74b30ad03860.Speaker: Gepard

6b253a704b3887a2.ContentText: Well, that's all from me... {NICKNAME}, Gepard, thanks for sticking by my side me throughout all of this.
6b253a704b3887a2.Speaker: Serval

adc8ba5134d75c8d.ContentText: Thank you for becoming our companion, {NICKNAME}. I'll do my best to answer any questions you may have.
adc8ba5134d75c8d.Speaker: Himeko

c5fe22f95b92732c.ContentText: You're most welcome, {NICKNAME}. Have some rest, you've earned it.
c5fe22f95b92732c.Speaker: Himeko

2667f2ad3b405d00.ContentText: So, your first trailblazing expedition has concluded. How do you feel, {NICKNAME}?
2667f2ad3b405d00.Speaker: Welt

2d9caf74eb6332b1.ContentText: ...Oh, welcome back to the Express. You've accomplished your Trailblaze Mission, the Express appreciates your help!

637313076c43fa7f.ContentText: I knew it. {NICKNAME}, you think so too, right?
637313076c43fa7f.Speaker: Asta

c2cc0d6ea6578364.ContentText: Hmm, it's better if I don't show my face... {NICKNAME}, see if you can get some intel out of him.
c2cc0d6ea6578364.Speaker: Asta

e4a6fc2a3a5f8a6f.ContentText: (Insert dramatic pause and sudden drama here...)
e4a6fc2a3a5f8a6f.Speaker: playergirl

1a514bbd080f91dc.ContentText: (Wow, the cringe is strong... I need to remember what I came here for!)
1a514bbd080f91dc.Speaker: playergirl

d16233e301f39725.ContentText: (His words match Arlan's work plan records. Seems like he does have key information.)
d16233e301f39725.Speaker: playergirl

d864cafeab485c52.ContentText: (Wow, the cringe is strong... I need to remember what I came here for!)
d864cafeab485c52.Speaker: playergirl

3c081c58fc73c853.ContentText: (His words match Arlan's work plans. Seems like he does have key information.)
3c081c58fc73c853.Speaker: playergirl

5c37cda75ab1e5c0.ContentText: (I can't let him get away like this. If he doesn't want to tell me, then...)
5c37cda75ab1e5c0.Speaker: playergirl

dd182d754b487439.ContentText: (Transcript? They've recorded Arlan's conversation with Capote...?)
dd182d754b487439.Speaker: playergirl

1a4b3ce8fdea9566.ContentText: (I didn't think a clue like that would suddenly pop up...)
1a4b3ce8fdea9566.Speaker: playergirl

1fb98069ce1d1687.ContentText: (Wow, the cringe is strong... I need to remember what I came here for!)
1fb98069ce1d1687.Speaker: playergirl

5a69ee561ca4f049.ContentText: (I can't let him get away like this. If he doesn't want to tell me, then...)
5a69ee561ca4f049.Speaker: playergirl

b4e254f9f27dca50.ContentText: (Transcript? They've recorded Arlan's conversation with Capote...?)
b4e254f9f27dca50.Speaker: playergirl

9751c6192acbf9e3.ContentText: (I didn't think a clue like that would suddenly pop up...)
9751c6192acbf9e3.Speaker: playergirl

320101727f79e4a2.ContentText: (Wow, the cringe is strong... I need to remember what I came here for!)
320101727f79e4a2.Speaker: playergirl

2b5cac6c65064535.ContentText: (This is the one who mentioned the transcript just now...)
2b5cac6c65064535.Speaker: playergirl

18d66894c470d5ec.ContentText: (So Peppy can locate March just by looking at a photo of her...)
18d66894c470d5ec.Speaker: playergirl

65003af57fbd9cff.ContentText: (...Is he really using scent to track?)
65003af57fbd9cff.Speaker: playergirl

c78a31663d2dbda0.ContentText: Arlan, you don't need to hide this from me any longer. {NICKNAME} and I know all about the trials you're putting yourself through!
c78a31663d2dbda0.Speaker: Asta

79fedb552d6c67e4.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, this evidence is a bit of a stretch... Do we have anything better?
79fedb552d6c67e4.Speaker: Asta

bbff611685fd5461.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, this evidence is a bit of a stretch... Do we have anything better?
bbff611685fd5461.Speaker: Asta

f129ca52aaac3b1c.ContentText: (There goes Serval... I better send Himeko a text and ask about the request...)
f129ca52aaac3b1c.Speaker: playergirl

bee47abfdfdda9af.ContentText: (...or I guess I could ask Mr. Yang — or Pom-Pom?)
bee47abfdfdda9af.Speaker: playergirl

82d3882ffc280ece.ContentText: (Hmm, who's the best one to ask...?)
82d3882ffc280ece.Speaker: playergirl

e55976ba4f9c1b00.ContentText: (Let's send a message to Mr. Yang...)
e55976ba4f9c1b00.Speaker: playergirl

fdc3d4f4f8e32ce8.ContentText: Huh? {NICKNAME}, you're just in time! Any news yet?
fdc3d4f4f8e32ce8.Speaker: Serval

6bb27bc8ab4e7be3.ContentText: Perfect timing, {NICKNAME} — please talk some sense into her.
6bb27bc8ab4e7be3.Speaker: Gepard

75a36d51dbbb8853.ContentText: Sorry, {NICKNAME} — I need to get this over with. Let me know what they said when I get back.
75a36d51dbbb8853.Speaker: Serval

5184718ba599d726.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, are you busy? Let's go and wait for her in front of Qlipoth Fort.
5184718ba599d726.Speaker: Gepard

0867ff6525352791.ContentText: I'm about to go traveling with {NICKNAME} — who knows how long it'll be before I can visit home again. You should help me pack while you still have the chance.
0867ff6525352791.Speaker: Serval

03575ad8f6559d0a.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you just need to make yourself at home. You've done plenty of work already!
03575ad8f6559d0a.Speaker: Serval

374ad80c4ab0a5d0.ContentText: ...Anyway, this specimen means a lot to me, so I'm bringing it with me. Thanks for the reminder, {NICKNAME}.
374ad80c4ab0a5d0.Speaker: Serval

a598c1a4aebb8a09.ContentText: Hey, wait a minute! {NICKNAME}, didn't I teach you a few machine-overhaul skills? Wanna practice on this old antique?
a598c1a4aebb8a09.Speaker: Serval

a32d641bc66fe991.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you don't have to do everything she tells you...
a32d641bc66fe991.Speaker: Gepard

014ce3c6c26b86bf.ContentText: So, I'll leave this one to you, {NICKNAME}. In return... how about I tell you the backstory behind it?
014ce3c6c26b86bf.Speaker: Serval

5b4b44398960d7ac.ContentText: I knew you were a reliable apprentice, {NICKNAME}!
5b4b44398960d7ac.Speaker: Serval

1c7ee221549e5deb.ContentText: ...Well done for putting up with her for this long, {NICKNAME}.
1c7ee221549e5deb.Speaker: Gepard

162a2b91c6003abd.ContentText: Wow, great job, {NICKNAME}! Like I said — a reliable apprentice!
162a2b91c6003abd.Speaker: Serval

378d56137a2e07f8.ContentText: Ugh, the clippings aren't the point — what I'm trying to say to {NICKNAME} is that we have a lot of talent in the Landau family!
378d56137a2e07f8.Speaker: Serval

488a94355e73e2b5.ContentText: Thanks, sis. {NICKNAME}, if you have the time, could you accompany the Garrison?
488a94355e73e2b5.Speaker: Gepard

01d4e3f333cd27ef.ContentText: I'm heading back to the military zone later. {NICKNAME}, do you want to go with me?
01d4e3f333cd27ef.Speaker: Gepard

3ce76832c78ab407.ContentText: You're... a very reliable person, {NICKNAME}. Even I feel lucky to have you as her travel companion.
3ce76832c78ab407.Speaker: Gepard

b490413e1826c192.ContentText: (Looks like Gepard's got his work cut out for him...)
b490413e1826c192.Speaker: playergirl

1dce93ab39c8781f.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you're here. Thanks again for agreeing to this.
1dce93ab39c8781f.Speaker: Gepard

79fd063b33fae7f9.ContentText: Negotiations will be held in the Boulder Town clinic. Serval and I are newcomers, so you'll have to lead the way, {NICKNAME}.
79fd063b33fae7f9.Speaker: Gepard

2dca65d9ef7b2171.ContentText: Hahaha, Oleg will do, son. Oh, {NICKNAME}, you probably won't know... Our young Silvermane friend here and I had the pleasure of speaking to each other at a certain guardian's succession ceremony — we're not complete strangers. But as for this young lady...

cae5fd3a0d258fc7.ContentText: And it's good to have you here again, {NICKNAME} — it bothered me and Natasha that we never arranged a formal welcome for you. Once we're done talking, you must all join us for a meal.

014ee5b4628332dd.ContentText: (Everyone rushed outside... I should probably see what's happening.)
014ee5b4628332dd.Speaker: playergirl

d8ecea181a6197ed.ContentText: I'll go on ahead and lead the troops to the mine. {NICKNAME}, Serval, catch up to us when you can.
d8ecea181a6197ed.Speaker: Gepard

023b92521c660320.ContentText: Gepard, {NICKNAME}, I have one last thing that I might need your help with.
023b92521c660320.Speaker: Serval

1ff4634f1bf28305.ContentText: Oh, but before that, I need to go back to the workshop and get something. {NICKNAME}, why don't you head north first and we'll catch up with you.
1ff4634f1bf28305.Speaker: Serval

fe521e8a48af5841.ContentText: Gepard, let me and {NICKNAME} clear the way for you. You should stay in your command post.
fe521e8a48af5841.Speaker: Serval

b34db688bd9e2a87.ContentText: I think he was right about the monster... Serval, {NICKNAME}, no sudden moves.
b34db688bd9e2a87.Speaker: Gepard

8d46153bf6beec8e.ContentText: Careful, {NICKNAME}. Special circumstances require a special approach.
8d46153bf6beec8e.Speaker: Gepard

9e4372cb2c2d39fc.ContentText: Whatever the case, we've managed to avert a crisis. Are you okay, {NICKNAME}?
9e4372cb2c2d39fc.Speaker: Gepard

8df2a4e71e623ff9.ContentText: All that noise before it perished... {NICKNAME}, did you catch what it said?
8df2a4e71e623ff9.Speaker: Serval

f44b3cae2d160dba.ContentText: Sure, come find us later at the clinic. {NICKNAME}, let's leave Gepard to his business and head back to town.
f44b3cae2d160dba.Speaker: Serval

c026af02849fd82d.ContentText: ...which would include what they did to you, {NICKNAME}...
c026af02849fd82d.Speaker: Welt

76718d69fc55a6fa.ContentText: Be careful, {NICKNAME}. Every time a Stellaron Hunter appears, their objective may be to steer the direction of the future.
76718d69fc55a6fa.Speaker: Welt

c960b66d7a0d285b.ContentText: For the sake of this discussion? Yes, I think so. But, {NICKNAME}... who isn't?
c960b66d7a0d285b.Speaker: Welt

d14753e878c56c81.ContentText: That's good, {NICKNAME}, but be careful — maybe the Stellaron Hunters showing up is a sign that they're trying to change the future...
d14753e878c56c81.Speaker: Welt

1695ab2c7fc8f540.ContentText: Can I help you with anything?

4b49bb582d2965cf.ContentText: Excuse me, {M#fella}{F#miss} — hold on a moment.

08883ab0712d76cc.ContentText: Thanks for helping to stabilize the patients — your "assertive sedation" techniques are quite effective.
08883ab0712d76cc.Speaker: Bailu

4a1bc071c9619129.ContentText: Hmph, welcome to the Xianzhou my short-lived outsider friends — appearances can be deceiving here! The Vidyadhara race is self-reincarnating — no mum or dad required!
4a1bc071c9619129.Speaker: Bailu

83472c3914d999f9.ContentText: Hm, well, seeing as you saved me just now, if you're unlucky enough to acquire any breaks or sprains... I'll treat you for free! As for medicine, I'll give you a twenty percent discount.
83472c3914d999f9.Speaker: Bailu

925da28a5adce8a8.ContentText: Did you hear that, {NICKNAME}? She said she's taking Mr. Yang jewelry shopping. Hehe, that'll be interesting.
925da28a5adce8a8.Speaker: March 7th

72b6d564f73a6b3a.ContentText: Psst, {NICKNAME}... I hath divined our future — we're destined to be errand runners forever...
72b6d564f73a6b3a.Speaker: March 7th

eefebe4f0131297a.ContentText: You go, {NICKNAME}. I don't wanna talk to that woman.
eefebe4f0131297a.Speaker: March 7th

7f7afa47e4b03e2f.ContentText: ...You know, {NICKNAME}, even Aeons can be killed.
7f7afa47e4b03e2f.Speaker: Kafka

2422859e21d1e55e.ContentText: What do you think, {NICKNAME}? Fascinating stories, no?
2422859e21d1e55e.Speaker: Kafka

29f32d30143ee926.ContentText: If what she said is true, we won't have to explain anything...
29f32d30143ee926.Speaker: playergirl

42c87474a9a23afd.ContentText: Well said, {NICKNAME}. Thank you for your assurance, Master Diviner. Onward.
42c87474a9a23afd.Speaker: Welt

f8d9d7b0f874d464.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, where are you going? The starskiff is ahead of us — follow my lead.

b01be490fb1534a3.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, are you listening to Mr. Yang!?
b01be490fb1534a3.Speaker: March 7th

af4cf3a8e6470c45.ContentText: (There seems to be the sound of electronic equipment...)
af4cf3a8e6470c45.Speaker: playergirl

d5e951b8e4b7972e.ContentText: (But... can he really sleep on such a hard bed?)
d5e951b8e4b7972e.Speaker: playergirl

696bd9877022638f.ContentText: (How did he know... Did my gaze betray me!?)
696bd9877022638f.Speaker: playergirl

8c402b021c771d60.ContentText: (I wonder if this is the only style of clothes he owns...)
8c402b021c771d60.Speaker: playergirl

b5e9a01125df09d9.ContentText: (The door is unlocked. Should I go in?)
b5e9a01125df09d9.Speaker: playergirl

0253131d36748ef2.ContentText: (Just one look should be fine, right?)
0253131d36748ef2.Speaker: playergirl

1d93869ea430f5f3.ContentText: (Better to wait till the room's owner comes back.)
1d93869ea430f5f3.Speaker: playergirl

c75a2373ec913083.ContentText: (There are even pictures of the space station...)
c75a2373ec913083.Speaker: playergirl

5f5449910d878d42.ContentText: Make a choice I won't regret... reach the future...
5f5449910d878d42.Speaker: playergirl

e737d8995062c869.ContentText: (So much has happened in such a short time...)
e737d8995062c869.Speaker: playergirl

fcf419fea35f3cbd.ContentText: (I can't tell what plant this is. Maybe I'll ask March 7th next time.)
fcf419fea35f3cbd.Speaker: playergirl

950898504182d39f.ContentText: (With such a huge doll on the bed, wouldn't it feel really cramped at night?)
950898504182d39f.Speaker: playergirl

03f374887f164b55.ContentText: (This looks like a souvenir from the journeys... right? Probably.)
03f374887f164b55.Speaker: playergirl

11e0fa88f6bc5513.Speaker: Clara
11e0fa88f6bc5513.ContentText: Clara: Hello... I'm Clara. Wanna be in my family? ...Like Mr. Svarog?\nSvarog: As long as I'm here, {NICKNAME} is your family.

e589a13699e194d8.ContentText: Of course not — I'm here on your invitation. Isn't that right?
e589a13699e194d8.Speaker: Asta

68fc9b0cb3dcd2dc.ContentText: I've been on the Express before, but this is my first visit with {NICKNAME} on board.
68fc9b0cb3dcd2dc.Speaker: Asta

a17b3b7afb081069.ContentText: I've been on the Express before, but this is my first visit with {NICKNAME} on board.
a17b3b7afb081069.Speaker: Asta

6990568a90ec5445.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, how come it lets you sit on it, but not me?
6990568a90ec5445.Speaker: Asta

702d02f2d08451d9.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, how come it lets you sit on it, but not me?
702d02f2d08451d9.Speaker: Asta

d4aacba278cf8d11.ContentText: When you find a moment, sit here and turn off the lights. You'll be amazed by what you can see.
d4aacba278cf8d11.Speaker: Asta

c3cab4c06dfe5ec6.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, if you get any time, you can sit here in the window seat, turn off the lights, and have a nice long gaze out the window.
c3cab4c06dfe5ec6.Speaker: Asta

3dab1432e36a1033.ContentText: Hey, {NICKNAME}! I was looking for you.
3dab1432e36a1033.Speaker: Asta

00391d36f970b641.ContentText: Thank you for inviting me aboard the Astral Express, {NICKNAME}.
00391d36f970b641.Speaker: Natasha

66fdc977b56d261c.ContentText: Thank you for inviting me aboard the Astral Express, {NICKNAME}.
66fdc977b56d261c.Speaker: Natasha

44fcda3e13671f0d.ContentText: Oh, it's you, {NICKNAME}. Sorry, I was lost in the view — I didn't realize you were here.
44fcda3e13671f0d.Speaker: Natasha

19cd879ac74ce84a.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I remember you once said that the Express travels across the universe and visits all kinds of different planets...
19cd879ac74ce84a.Speaker: Natasha

ee3188d1f5edbe3a.ContentText: Hey, {NICKNAME}! I've been looking for you.
ee3188d1f5edbe3a.Speaker: Natasha

716c9605aa57d789.ContentText: Promise me, honorary member {NICKNAME}: When Hook isn't here on the train...
716c9605aa57d789.Speaker: Hook

271f189a84fd252c.ContentText: Promise me, honorary member {NICKNAME}: When Hook isn't here on the train...
271f189a84fd252c.Speaker: Hook

34e73f226471625e.ContentText: Well, well, well, if it isn't our honorary member {NICKNAME}!
34e73f226471625e.Speaker: Hook

89dceca7310a28dd.ContentText: Hey, honorary member {NICKNAME}! Boss Hook has been looking for you. Where have you been?
89dceca7310a28dd.Speaker: Hook

d83d40f594571e34.ContentText: Thank you for bringing me along, {NICKNAME}!
d83d40f594571e34.Speaker: Clara

c3f12689397fe29e.ContentText: Thank you for bringing me along, {NICKNAME}!
c3f12689397fe29e.Speaker: Clara

46971f13d5203aee.ContentText: Ah! How come I never thought of that? Thanks {NICKNAME}!
46971f13d5203aee.Speaker: Clara

fe633e6a99a0bf4b.ContentText: Mm... If you think so too, then I'll definitely try. Thanks, {NICKNAME}.
fe633e6a99a0bf4b.Speaker: Clara

3fff6351f04b3774.ContentText: Mm... are you sure, {NICKNAME}? I still want to give it a try...
3fff6351f04b3774.Speaker: Clara

58799b1cf6f23b3a.ContentText: Oh, it's you! I wanted to show you something...
58799b1cf6f23b3a.Speaker: Clara

782068425a94b8a8.ContentText: Actually... I wanted to ask if you remember Pascal.
782068425a94b8a8.Speaker: Clara

25f15ff94bb523b6.ContentText: It's Pascal's handwriting — he says he wanted to send the pebbles to you as a gift.
25f15ff94bb523b6.Speaker: Clara

ffb343fedc25be2d.ContentText: I'm not sure what the pebbles are used for... but please take them! It would make Pascal happy.
ffb343fedc25be2d.Speaker: Clara

6bf9e430508bf344.ContentText: ...Oh! When you have time, don't forget to come back to Robot Settlement and pay us a visit.
6bf9e430508bf344.Speaker: Clara

495cb2b5a466b2a3.ContentText: I hope you like these pebbles, {F#big sister}{M#big brother} {NICKNAME}...
495cb2b5a466b2a3.Speaker: Clara

3527c391a9a88862.ContentText: ...Oh! When you have time, don't forget to come back to Robot Settlement and pay us a visit.
3527c391a9a88862.Speaker: Clara

8219f8b08b3ccc6d.ContentText: Thanks for inviting me, {NICKNAME}. I've got my hands full right now, but I'm looking forward to the Express tour!
8219f8b08b3ccc6d.Speaker: Serval

3a70cbcacbc52e50.ContentText: Thanks for inviting me, {NICKNAME}. I've got my hands full right now, but I'm looking forward to the Express tour!
3a70cbcacbc52e50.Speaker: Serval

dff86526f5ec5449.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, can I borrow the Express's phonograph for a few days?
dff86526f5ec5449.Speaker: Serval

02d1f9915f7cddfd.ContentText: I should've known you'd be cool with it, {NICKNAME}!
02d1f9915f7cddfd.Speaker: Serval

0d84ea59bcd59e32.ContentText: I should've known you'd be cool with it, {NICKNAME}!
0d84ea59bcd59e32.Speaker: Serval

11c531d0cf56b30f.ContentText: Right on time, {NICKNAME}! I just finished chatting with Himeko.
11c531d0cf56b30f.Speaker: Serval

f56620d1bb5f0ea7.ContentText: Hey {NICKNAME}, how would you describe Mr. Yang?
f56620d1bb5f0ea7.Speaker: Serval

992339a037b01708.ContentText: Hey {NICKNAME}, if you were to write a song about the Express, what would you name it?
992339a037b01708.Speaker: Serval

7d66b564f4968860.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, how about you give me some ideas... and I get you some more gifts?
7d66b564f4968860.Speaker: Serval

279ab408b801b168.ContentText: Anyway, thanks for inviting me to see the train, {NICKNAME}. I've seen the Express when it was docked at the platform, but this is my first time on board.
279ab408b801b168.Speaker: Arlan

cc45521dc4c39404.ContentText: Thanks for your advice, {NICKNAME}. It's nice to have a break every now and then.
cc45521dc4c39404.Speaker: Arlan

bddc1e62bb0b34c9.ContentText: Thanks for your advice, {NICKNAME}. It's nice to have a break every now and then.
bddc1e62bb0b34c9.Speaker: Arlan

5b4a6ea0b9b568e0.ContentText: Uh... Sorry, {NICKNAME}, I was talking about Pom-Pom, the conductor. But hey, you're super good at what you do, too!
5b4a6ea0b9b568e0.Speaker: Arlan

9664671289cf7c03.ContentText: Oh, uh, what were we talking about again? Coffee! Sorry, {NICKNAME}.
9664671289cf7c03.Speaker: Arlan

6412dbeedec11f1f.ContentText: Oh, uh, what were we talking about again? Coffee! Sorry, {NICKNAME}.
6412dbeedec11f1f.Speaker: Arlan

b72115d23d08d43f.ContentText: Thanks for inviting me to the Express, {NICKNAME} — it's been nice to have a break.
b72115d23d08d43f.Speaker: Arlan

c401810b41479a23.ContentText: Oh, that's right! Forgive my forgetfulness — glad you came, {NICKNAME}! It's great to have one of the general's distinguished guests helping us out.

a723180ca2f02d06.ContentText: C'mon now, {NICKNAME}, this is a serious matter — there's no time for jokes.

72267b6e5b08bdfa.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I read the letter you obtained from the mara-struck.

ed6ab41a87cc732a.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I have a favor to ask of you.

36a1d65f8bd38447.ContentText: I'm at my wit's end with you, {F#Sister}{M#Brother}.

9aaa3513617e6524.ContentText: Took you long enough... I know you — you're {NICKNAME}, General Jing Yuan's honored guest!

10223c1338ab892a.ContentText: Alright, finally... I know you — you're {NICKNAME}, General Jing Yuan's honored guest!

1b0e51c28e3908e9.ContentText: (Green Hibiscus agreed to meet me here, but there's no sight of him. What gives?)
1b0e51c28e3908e9.Speaker: playergirl

932ac2ba4b5dcdc2.ContentText: (There's a letter here... What's this on the enevlope? "Gray Peony..." This must be from Green Hibiscus.)
932ac2ba4b5dcdc2.Speaker: playergirl

fb309c9d2a677103.ContentText: (The Disciples sure know how to keep a low profile... Looks like I'll need to help them complete this mission.)
fb309c9d2a677103.Speaker: playergirl

d0bfd45768dca28c.ContentText: (If they're looking to intercept a letter, then I should probably search around the Exalting Sanctum's Cycrane Stand.)
d0bfd45768dca28c.Speaker: playergirl

37c9edb1bcec8bd5.ContentText: (It doesn't seem to be on this Cycrane Stand. Let's check out another one.)
37c9edb1bcec8bd5.Speaker: playergirl

df3ae5a3177fdfbe.ContentText: (What's written on this package? "Seat of Divine Foresight, Urgent..." This is it — the mail the Disciples want to intercept.)
df3ae5a3177fdfbe.Speaker: playergirl

c8df11797f59141f.ContentText: (Hmm, seems like it's encypted somehow... Makes sense, this is critical intelligence after all... Let's see if I can crack the code.)
c8df11797f59141f.Speaker: playergirl

24a05a8016520808.ContentText: (Code cracked... Huh, it's an internal order from the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus.)
24a05a8016520808.Speaker: playergirl

68c2f602bccac5a1.ContentText: (Judging from these "Urgent Instructions," the Disciples are aware of a Seat of Divine Foresight operation to infiltrate their ranks... No wonder Green Hibiscus was so eager to intercept this.)
68c2f602bccac5a1.Speaker: playergirl

044681f03b7201d3.ContentText: (I'll use my phone to make a copy and then hand it over to Green Hibiscus.)
044681f03b7201d3.Speaker: playergirl

86d571fb652c12a3.ContentText: Is that the general's honored guest? I didn't expect to see you around Exalting Sanctum.

a0a33095ea4695d2.ContentText: (It's an internal order from the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus.)
a0a33095ea4695d2.Speaker: playergirl

a556930c8a46adb9.ContentText: (Judging from these "Urgent Instructions," the Disciples are aware of a Seat of Divine Foresight operation to infiltrate their ranks... No wonder Green Hibiscus was so eager to intercept this.)
a556930c8a46adb9.Speaker: playergirl

2476333e99b01f40.ContentText: (I'll use my phone to make a copy and then hand it over to Green Hibiscus.)
2476333e99b01f40.Speaker: playergirl

f0ccc1f74ae70dd1.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you did the right thing. I'm afraid this is how the Plagues Author operates — using notions of power and life to draw countless people like Zhixin away from bright futures... down a path of no return.

3a1d4eb329c0d4e2.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, given that the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus has become aware of our operation, it's about time the Seat of Divine Foresight reeled in its net.

dd8c90cf2a2c2203.ContentText: I've been looking forward to meeting you... {NICKNAME}.

ace561c1795dc3ef.ContentText: (So Mauve Moon was the agent that Qingzu lost contact with... he joined the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus.)
ace561c1795dc3ef.Speaker: playergirl

c1f044b4463c120e.ContentText: (I should go to the Seat of Divine Foresight and tell Qingzu... I don't know if this mission was a success or a failure.)
c1f044b4463c120e.Speaker: playergirl
