8d4196a33a5f3fe0.ContentText: (Looks like Dan Shu found something conclusive — let's go and talk to her.)
8d4196a33a5f3fe0.Speaker: playergirl

bcfb624b5c2eed37.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, you're back. Anything you wanted to share?

9f643395cf6011e1.ContentText: Still, this is a clue we can follow. Thank you, {NICKNAME}. Please accept these gifts for your efforts.

cc31c8244a6f0afc.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, thank you for coming on such short notice.

968678917cbd4f8f.ContentText: Thank you. If she's gotten into any trouble, {NICKNAME}, be sure to let me know when you get back.

e3043f1b3279f5d9.ContentText: The patient in question is a little girl. If she's gotten into any trouble, be sure to let me know when you get back, {NICKNAME}.

1e94f23fc2191873.ContentText: (Is this the one Dan Shu sent me to find? Does she come here to treat other sightless people?)
1e94f23fc2191873.Speaker: playergirl

e60623bac4a05509.ContentText: Thank goodness you're here, or they wouldn't have let me off so easily.

1d9b03d40885a2a3.ContentText: Things are bad on the Luofu recently — Dan Shu must be very busy. Thank you, {F#miss}{M#mister}, remember to thank her for me.

a01894bb5bbc417c.ContentText: (*sigh* Well, I've delivered the medicine. I should report back to Dan Shu.)
a01894bb5bbc417c.Speaker: playergirl

2a55ad8934203484.ContentText: Thank you for looking after the child. Could I ask you for another favor, {NICKNAME}?

4038354eb4aae344.ContentText: *sniffle* Thank you {F#big sister}{M#big brother}, thank you Dan Shu...

1dba591f6874cac0.ContentText: You don't need to be scared anymore, {NICKNAME} is here.

8a3c7384b7fa7cfa.ContentText: But I... When I think about all the trouble I've caused you two... I feel like such a burden... I'm sorry...

93a4275ca708b456.ContentText: This place is too dangerous, {NICKNAME}. Let's head back to Exalting Sanctum.

8b79bcc249e26b67.ContentText: Thank you for sticking with me through all of this, {NICKNAME}. I think my aspirations in Exalting Sanctum have been met, for now.

6a6d45288e0a860f.ContentText: (Dan Shu needs more time to prepare my gift. There's nothing pressing right now, why not head over to Spare Time Book Shop for a while?)
6a6d45288e0a860f.Speaker: playergirl

6a67d3cd4732a5b8.ContentText: I call it the Brumedew Concentrate Pellet, and I'd like you to have it, {NICKNAME}.

d6eabd5a029fb9ae.ContentText: (Hmm... Tastes a bit strange, but no adverse reactions so far...)
d6eabd5a029fb9ae.Speaker: playergirl

b040b2058d3b2651.ContentText: (Wait a minute... Argh, my head... What's happening?)
b040b2058d3b2651.Speaker: playergirl

1f58b02175752c78.ContentText: (S—Something's wrong — I'm burning up... Feels like I can't breathe...)
1f58b02175752c78.Speaker: playergirl

50dec4cf641c395e.ContentText: (Whew... Seems to be calming down a little, but still uncomfortable...)
50dec4cf641c395e.Speaker: playergirl

e9183dd4bdb2ab3f.ContentText: (This doesn't seem right, I'd better talk to Qingzu at the Seat of Divine Foresight.)
e9183dd4bdb2ab3f.Speaker: playergirl

43169e4784a7fc2c.ContentText: (It's not that I don't trust Dan Shu... but this doesn't seem like something I should take lightly.)
43169e4784a7fc2c.Speaker: playergirl

af73af4ba2f9a175.ContentText: (Something feels off — I'd better talk to Qingzu at the Seat of Divine Foresight.)
af73af4ba2f9a175.Speaker: playergirl

b0c40ca7f329d1e2.ContentText: (Argh... There goes my head again... Is Dan Shu sure this Brumedew is safe for consumption?)
b0c40ca7f329d1e2.Speaker: playergirl

c4f8fbcbede7fc23.ContentText: (What's happening? Isn't this the Seat of Divine Foresight? Why are there so many mara-struck here...)
c4f8fbcbede7fc23.Speaker: playergirl

38f957d930712590.ContentText: (No... I can't let them... get near me...)
38f957d930712590.Speaker: playergirl

fa1b1f75c103ee4b.ContentText: {NICKNAME}! What happened to you? Be careful, don't hurt {F#her}{M#him}...

c46724e4220444b5.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, it's been a while. To what does the Seat of Divine Foresight owe the pleasure?

4744204a3ecf6481.ContentText: Thank the stars you were wise enough not take that pellet, {NICKNAME} — my alchemists were able to extract many forbidden components. The result... is identical to the Disciples' mysterious prescription...

8d641bb2aa02ae89.ContentText: (Dan Shu isn't here... Where could she be?)
8d641bb2aa02ae89.Speaker: playergirl

a18da90f95366d36.ContentText: (I've got it. Dan Shu's medicine box has her scent on it — I'll ask the Diting that Qingzu lent me to track her.)
a18da90f95366d36.Speaker: playergirl

848994801b1457db.ContentText: (That's... Dan Shu... with a group of Disciples... I guess that tells me all I need to know...)
848994801b1457db.Speaker: playergirl

9077befadf169a14.ContentText: Many of our brethren have fallen by {F#her}{M#his} hands!

ed149aa7fbc2d957.ContentText: I said, {F#she}{M#he} is my friend. Leave us.

3cdddd5aae733668.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, I didn't expect you to come looking for me.

a572eee90cfdd6f4.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, please, I urge you to leave the Luofu... Abandon this struggle, the truth isn't what it appears to be.

319a6b7c9d5cd67a.ContentText: (*sigh* ...I'd better report my findings to Qingzu at the Seat of Divine Foresight.)
319a6b7c9d5cd67a.Speaker: playergirl

d829fe7b90cb4191.ContentText: Master, please retreat now. Our main mission is impending. We cannot be stalled here by {F#her}{M#him}.

18c1ed329012ee41.ContentText: {NICKNAME}, lay down your weapon. Our fighting will only result in mutual suffering — something I would not wish to see.

8c7031fb19cc9c01.ContentText: (*sigh* ...I'd better report my findings to Qingzu at the Seat of Divine Foresight.)
8c7031fb19cc9c01.Speaker: playergirl

f5104428a1fb4217.ContentText: Time to come out, little Diting. I need you to help me find Dan Shu.
f5104428a1fb4217.Speaker: playergirl
